pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decompose Demographic Functions // Three general demographic decomposition methods: Pseudo-continuous decomposition proposed by Horiuchi, Wilmoth, and Pletcher (2008) doi:10.1353/dem.0.0033, stepwise replacement decomposition proposed by Andreev, Shkolnikov and Begun (2002) doi:10.4054/DemRes.2002.7.14, and lifetable response experiments proposed by Caswell (1989) doi:10.1016/0304-3800(89)90019-7.
